channel.title: Sword of Baazarin
channel.description:
OK I know the colors are a little wierd but well that happens taking all feed back good or bad helpful or not Also the end of the handle it looks sorta like the end of amy_webb's godsword so I'll give her credit cause thats where i got the concept from
Pic:[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-tJBiNsaVVqo/UKGP7_A1kCI/AAAAAAAAAKU/a7VMe2N8LWk/s623/Sword+of+Baazarin.bmp[/img]
Wire:[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-PcRmmrXxxFs/UKGP6YXfTXI/AAAAAAAAAKM/SKwKoID4NTM/s734/Mesh.png[/img]

item.title: Sword of Baazarin
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Throw out that color scheme and now properly ratio the handle with the blade.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword of Baazarin
item.dc:creator: @allinall allinall
item.description:
@allinall wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:467671”]The Hilt Handle looks rather small when compared to how bulky the rest of the Sword is. It looks decent, but can always be improved upon.

You’re improving; keep it up.

P.S. The Blade design is kind of strange.[/quote]
Thanks. I tried other blade looks But none of them matched the hilt that was the best one

Read full topic

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The Hilt Handle looks rather small when compared to how bulky the rest of the Sword is. It looks decent, but can always be improved upon.

You’re improving; keep it up.

P.S. The Blade design is kind of strange.
